channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 3 people involved in a Minnesota church protest are arrested, as judge refuses to charge Don Lemon
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi says a woman who led an anti-immigration enforcement protest that disrupted a service at a Minnesota church has been arrested.

item.title: Maine’s governor demands data on immigration arrests as fear spreads amid enforcement surge
Federal officers detain a 5-year-old boy who a school official says was used as ‘bait’
